JOB DESCRIPTION: This is a great opportunity to develop a Medium size Web application product from scratch. So need to have a Technical Lead from Architecture Design experience and a Senior Developer experience from Coding and Database development perspective. You will solely be responsible to Develop entire application and database.          Requirements:         2 plus years total experience in developing .NET MVC Entity Framework Web applications with MS SQLServer.      2 years plus experience in developing applications from scratch, data modeling and data migrations including Database Development maintenance (applying constraints and creating stored procedures) is required.      Knowledge/Experience of the following is advantageous: WCF, WF, WPF, RSS, CSS, Telerik ASP.NET-AJAX controls and Silverlight.       Important:       At least 2 years experience
